game.cards.playabledevelopmentcards

Class PlayableDevelopmentCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.cards.DevelopmentCard
      • game.cards.playabledevelopmentcards.PlayableDevelopmentCard

  • public class PlayableDevelopmentCard
extends DevelopmentCard
    Represents a development card which can be played.
    Author:
    Christoph Hermann
